channel.title: Webclient error
channel.description:
Hello guys,
First of all i am new to moparscape.
So for the last few days i have been working on my own RSPS server so i made a webclient on webs.com (free website) And also using no-ip, i opend my port aswell... But there is a problem: when i try to load the page the client is fully working and goes to 100% and can log in (logged in) But when my friend try this he get the login screen and try to hit on log in waiting a few seconds and give this error: Error connecting to server.... so only me can join this webclient can anyone help me ? i really want to fix this so i can move on.
Thanks, Rowin (new Moparscape user)

item.title: Webclient error
item.dc:creator: @rowin16 rowin16
item.description:
@rowin16 wrote:

well to be honest i am not using a jar cause i am not handy with that maybe is that a problem?

Still having a problem anyone can help me?

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient error
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Your server doesn’t need an IP, it only needs the port.

It’s not the website or cache, because it’s saying error connecting, if it was the website it wouldn’t load the jar, and if it was the cache the client wouldn’t load properly.

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient error
item.dc:creator: @rowin16 rowin16
item.description:
@rowin16 wrote:

@sk8rdude461
Maybe cause its a free website or something? or maybe other can join of a cache issue??
i really wanne figure this out man
Or is there Something in my running server a ip?? it only say’s running on port

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient error
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

If your port is open, the server is on and the IPs are correct I don’t see an issue…

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient error
item.dc:creator: @rowin16 rowin16
item.description:
@rowin16 wrote:

@sk8rdude461
Thanks for helping me out,

Only the problem is when i changed the IP to my ip there is the same problem,
I can connect but other cant and my port is still open…

Any idea? (Thanks btw)

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient error
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Try changing the IP in the client to your ip (if you need it go to http://whatismyip.com/ ).
Compile, then jar and sign your client and try that.

There may be more than one instance of “server = yourIP” in the client too.

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient error
item.dc:creator: @rowin16 rowin16
item.description:
@rowin16 wrote:

@sk8rdude461

Thanks for your post

Well The up is in my client,No-ip Duc is running aswell and is running the no-ip address that i made.
Then i Running my server and check if the port is still open and yea it is still open aswell on the no-ip address.

Any idea?

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient error
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

This sounds like a port or IP problem.
Make sure the IP in your client is your no-ip, and also make sure the No-IP DUC is running and it is using your no-ip address you made.
Then double check if the port (presumably 43594) is open when you have the server on.

Read full topic
